definition: Zhang Zhidong (1837-1909), prominent politician in late Qing
surname Zhang
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: Later, Chang Chih-tung in "Quan Xue Pian, " also mentioned "in the body of the West to use.
sentences.chinese: 後來張之洞在《勸學篇》中亦提“中體西用”。

sentences.english: Therefore, the research on Chang Chih-tung's ideas has both historic and realistic significance.
sentences.chinese: 研究張之洞的實業教育思想具有歷史意義和現實意義。

sentences.english: The right-maintaining ideas embody Zhang(Zhidong's) consciousness of nation's sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 讓利爭權的維權思想，體現了張之洞的國家主權意識。

sentences.english: During his reign over Guangdong and Guangxi, Zhang Zhidong made some achievements on governing the Li nationality in Qiongzhou.
sentences.chinese: 張之洞督粵期間治理瓊州黎族取得了一定的成效。
